title: 清理怪物的插件是哪个，每次都把要打的怪清了，很难受
author: kongbai123456
txt_content:

replies.author: 卑微的路人
replies.txt_content:
将nerverlag配置打开按以下修改
ClearEntity:
  #是否开启
  Enable: true
改为
ClearEntity:
  #是否开启
  Enable: false

replies.author: Regiment_Red
replies.txt_content: 可能是你的NeverLag的作用 去config里面看看
